dimensions: Warp x Weft: 9.8 x 7 cm (3 7/8 x 2 3/4 in.)
title: Portrait of Henry VIII (c. 1540) by Hans Holbein the Younger (1497-1543)
description: Woven souvenir based on the painting 'Portrait of Henry VIII' (c. 1540) by Hans Holbein the Younger (1497-1543). "W.W.L. CO. 1963 DEL. H.H." appears below the portrait. Black, burgundy, golden-yellow, white, and salmon on white warp.
name: Souvenir ribbon portrait
